price: Jene, die nicht an das Jenseits glauben, weichen fürwahr vom Weg ab.
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَنِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ لَنَٰكِبُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wa-inna alladhīna lā yu'minūna bil-ākhirati ʿani al-ṣirāṭi lanākibūna
